**Windows available now in Singapore location on Just Cloud Basic plan 
**
JustVPS has become a member of the Microsoft SPLA Partner Network and thanks to this we launched Cloud Windows VPS in partnership with Crayon 🥳

⚡️ Enjoy this amazing alternative to Desktop Windows running on Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server 2019 🥳

☑️ Familiar Windows 10ish interface ❱❱❱ RDP connectivity ❱❱❱ other features that make your web app hosting pretty smooth⚡️

☝️ Let us know if you're looking for corporate Windows hosting solutions and we will tailor it to your needs!

Looking glass:
http://sg.lg.justvps.online/
